member_organisations:

fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Philippe Zaouati, Mirova CEO, is a member of the High Level Expert Group on sustainable finance. Identified areas of interest within the work of the HLEG are: support the development of long-term oriented finance for sustainability, transparency and ESG disclosure for corporates and for the financial sector (TCFD, article 173), development of sustainable finance for retail investors with reliable and high quality standards and labels, development of blended finance for sustainable development
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group on sustainable finance #E03588#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3588#Member#C#Low carbon benchmarks#High-Level Expert Group on Sustainable Finance#E03485#ZAOUATI Philippe#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3485#Member#B#Finance

goals__remit: Asset management company, subsidiary of Natixis. Fully dedicated to responsible investments with the aim to promote sustainable finance. 72 people based mainly in Paris, Boston and London. EURO €8.3 billion in assets under management in 2017 in equities, bonds, infrastructures and impact investing.
